website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Charged Ultimate 3.0 passed the consumers’ reception with flying colors. The highlights were its comfortable structure, fashion-forward design, supportive midsole, and precise fit. Despite the accolades, it also garnered negative feedback from the naysayers. They griped about the stiff upper and easily ripped mesh. That said, the pros still outweighed the cons, making it a solid footwear choice for the majority.
pros: A vast number of wearers claimed that the Under Armour Charged Ultimate 3.0 was perfect for gym training, walking, and CrossFit due to the comfort that it provided
Many consumers commended its modern design
The shoe had a solid support, which kept plenty of fitness aficionados stable during extreme movements
A handful of reviewers remarked that the footwear was fabricated to be great-fitting
Several testers noted that its lightweight structure made it easier for them to move without limits
The trainer was considered to be a good value for money due to its quality and affordable price
cons: Most of the critics expressed discontent towards the footgear due to the stiff upper, which required a break-in period
The mesh fabric tore up easily in the high-wear areas, based on various complaints
Scores of people were disappointed by the discomfort that the burrito tongue caused
A handful of buyers criticized its narrow fit

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: So far these look good. Feel nice. They seem to have a slip resistant on the bottom. I'll update my review once these shoes get worn awhile, but the look of them are great. I would reccomend wearing thinner socks. My cotton under armour high socks sort of bunch up. But to each their own. ***update 9 months later*** I would suggest wearing slightly higher socks than ankle socks. When I wear ankle socks with these,my heal always gets rubbed and ends up with a sore or bloody. I will be buying more of a show socks now.
customer_reviews.author: C.L

customer_reviews.title: Stiff,look good, not for running,
customer_reviews.text: Would not reccomend for running they are too stiff, they sit low on your ankle. They have yet to brake in and i have already ran miles in them. The bottom of the shoe is too flat and stiff. They look nice but would not recommend for running. They would work for casual wear or exercises such as squatting since the bottom is flat. I can barely walk in them due to back of shoe rubbing on ankle and giving me blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed relieved the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: They sent me the wrong size the shoes are nice shoes for the price but not if you receive a size to big this close to Christmas so his gift won’t fit with no time to return it
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, very comfy, cushion on the back heel part of shoe. Fits as expected. Only small issue is that the right shoes heel digs into my heel at the top. Not sure why only my right. No other shoe has done this before.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Very decent my only complaint upon destroying these shoes yesterday was I wish the rubber sole was harder rubber but decent shoes will try something else next time
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Thin shoe. Be careful
customer_reviews.text: The shoe runs thin. It is well made and most likely would be a good shoe if it wasn’t so thin.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy briles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad for Christmas. They're the only shoes I ever see him west now. He loved them. A++
customer_reviews.author: Jess Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Fake shoes
customer_reviews.text: Thais shoes start Brocken a part like they are fake now wondering why underarmour .com don’t have that color
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I both the shoes for my son and he likes them because they were comfortable since the 1st time he wears them. He usually wears size 12 and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hayha

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking tennis shoes. Bought sz7.5 (wear a woman's size 9). Fit great, unisex. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Skailah

customer_reviews.title: Decent !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend he said they were a little tight but with wear they started fitting better. Decent quality for the price i paid. *attached photos are after being worn*
customer_reviews.author: J4413

customer_reviews.title: Kind of bulky
customer_reviews.text: The shoe it self it's really well put together . It's feel really good on the feet. They run true to size and the black on red looks amazing. The only thing I don't like that much is the bulkyness of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Israel Monge Lagunes

customer_reviews.title: looks good and comfy
customer_reviews.text: the only thing that i can complain about is the heel rubs high on my foot...i am sure it will get broken in soon, but is a bit painful during the process
customer_reviews.author: Allicia K. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: No Padding - feet were very sore
customer_reviews.text: Really like the design of these shoes, but they do not have enough padding for high intensity workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for myself, these shoes were very comfortable however they ran just a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Kody L.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great fit. May even purchase a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable & look great
customer_reviews.text: These are for my husband and he loves them! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Shoe!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits perfect because it’s my size. However, they sent me the wrong shoe!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Roberts

customer_reviews.title: EXTREME Yellowing
customer_reviews.text: I just received yesterday and unboxed today. Scuffs. EXTREME Yellowing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Nice and stylish but not good for walking long distances. They really eat up the back of your heel. Perfectly find for normal every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Given for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my father in law as a gift. He wears them all the time and likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lihgt.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Shoes they are good. They fit dood and feels good. Very reasonable priced. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Khalil mahmood

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: This fit pretty true-to-size widthwise and are every so slightly large length wise, so order your typical size. The design is nice and look gooks good. it is a good combination of mesh and synthetics. Inside these are nice and plush, and have a decent sole so you feel some support, more so than basic sneakers. They feel nice on, and after a day of being in them I am not bothered by them at all - very comfy. I will update the review down the road as far as durability.
customer_reviews.author: B. Colonna

customer_reviews.title: Solid everyday sneaker with nice simple style
customer_reviews.text: After a week of wear, these shoes seem generally as expected. They're pretty comfortable, and I like the nice simple style. The gray is nicely understated, and the look is athletic without being loud. The heel is a bit stiff, so they are slightly awkward to put on, but a shoehorn completely eliminates that issue for me, and they may soften with some wear. These seem like a solid everyday sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: James K

customer_reviews.title: Roomy toe box, nice fit on wider foot, lightweight cross-trainer
customer_reviews.text: All of the Under Armour shoes I've worn seem to have a good last for a wider foot. The toe box is never cramped. These have good support and a good fit for general cross-training and running. I'm not crazy about this color, it's a bit too light to look good for general wear; but it's pretty neutral and not obnoxious or weird like many athletic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: OK if you're not picky
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are ok, about average. I like the cushioning and the look but the overall sensation is not of quality comfort. The left sneaker abraids my foot when I walk. Perhaps it will soften over time but when I tried to work with the area that felt pinching it was not responsive. Overall this is about what I'd expect in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: A. Koren

customer_reviews.title: Great running/walking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers offer a lot of support and a great option for walking or running. The gray and white design is minimal and goes with anything. The size 9 fit a little smaller/snugger than other size 9 sneakers but not drastically. If you like your shoes looser or are in between sizes, go up to the next size.
customer_reviews.author: mhp

customer_reviews.title: Runs Very Small. Not Much Support
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker runs small in length and width. Size up at least one complete size. If your foot is very wide, this would not be a good choice. There is not much support to this shoe. There are innovative lacing options that should please a variety of fits.
customer_reviews.author: Wandrwoman

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Charged Ultimate 3.0 Fitness Shoes
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh upper is lightweight, flexible and durable
Synthetic strap on forefoot provides added stability
Charged Cushioning midsole absorbs impact and converts it into a responsive burst
Full-length, non-marking, rubber outsole increases durability, traction and support
Custom tread pattern designed for grip and traction on any surface
